directions: In a small bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, lemon juice, sugar, white wine vinegar, garlic, Worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper, and chile sauce.
In a large bowl, combine cabbage, broccoli, bell peppers, and crab.  Toss mixture with dressing.  Cover, and refrigerate until ready to serve.
ingredients: 1 head fresh broccoli, cut into florets
title: Seafood And Cabbage Salad
